alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:05PM CDT until May 31 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR OSCEOLA...DICKINSON...CLAY...EASTERN O`BRIEN...JACKSON...SOUTHERN NOBLES AND SOUTH CENTRAL COTTONWOOD COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Worthington to near Linn Grove, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Webb, Lake Park, Milford, Lakefield, Okoboji, Wahpeton, West Okoboji, Spirit Lake, Arnolds Park, Orleans, Kilen Woods State Park, Jackson In Jackson County and Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
